name: Venafi TLS Protect Datacenter Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Venafi TLS Protect Datacenter Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Datacenter

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Venafi TLS Protect Datacenter | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: certificate

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

PolicyDN.name: PolicyDN
PolicyDN.description: The folder DN for the new certificate. If the value is missing, the folder name is the system default. If no system default is configured
PolicyDN.natural_language_description: 参数名: Policy DN | 作用: The folder DN for the new certificate. If the value is missing, the folder name is the system default. If no system default is configured

Subject.name: Subject
Subject.description: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (DN)
Subject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (DN)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: PKCS10 (值: None) - The PKCS#10 policy Signing Request (CSR). Omit escape characters such as or . If this value is provided, any Subject DN fields and the KeyBitSize in the request are ignored.

certificateDn.name: certificateDn
certificateDn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate DN | (必填项)

includePrivateKey.name: includePrivateKey
includePrivateKey.natural_language_description: 参数名: Include Private Key | 默认值: False

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded
binaryProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded | 默认值: data | (必填项)

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.description: A GUID that uniquely identifies the certificate
certificateId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate GUID | 作用: A GUID that uniquely identifies the certificate | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Include one or more of the following certificate attributes in the return value

certificateDN.name: certificateDN
certificateDN.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the certificate to renew
certificateDN.natural_language_description: 参数名: Certificate DN | 作用: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the certificate to renew | (必填项)

policyDn.name: policyDn
policyDn.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the policy folder
policyDn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Policy DN | 作用: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the policy folder | (必填项)
